user.title: Connect Einsatz-Monitor
user.description:
Enter the URL of your Einsatz-Monitor and your API token.

You can find the token in Settings under 'Home Assistant'.

error.cannot_connect: Connection failed. Please check the URL and ensure the server is reachable.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid or expired token. Please generate a new token in Einsatz-Monitor.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please check the logs.

init.title: Configure Notifications
init.description:
Configure automatic notifications on alarm.

Message template variables: '{'keyword'}', '{'unit'}', '{'vehicles'}', '{'timestamp'}'

data.light_duration: Light duration in seconds (0 = don't turn off)
